definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Endiumnugget</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="gui_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">info</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">use craft</field></block></value><next><block type="gui_clear_slot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">kill @e[limit=1,sort=arbitrary,distance=0..10,type=palamod:godvillager]</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
